com.upsight.android.marketing

Class UpsightBillboardHandlers.DefaultHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.upsight.android.marketing.UpsightBillboardHandlers.DefaultHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UpsightBillboard.Handler
    Enclosing class:
    UpsightBillboardHandlers

    public static class UpsightBillboardHandlers.DefaultHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    An UpsightBillboard.Handler implementation that displays the marketing content according to the UpsightBillboard.PresentationStyle that the marketing content prefers to be rendered in.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultHandler

        public DefaultHandler(android.app.Activity activity)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity used to show the Fragment holding the content view.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        public UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters onAttach(java.lang.String scope)
        Description copied from interface: UpsightBillboard.Handler
        Called when marketing content becomes available. Return an UpsightBillboard.AttachParameters instance to show the content, or null to skip. In the latter case, this method will be called again when new eligible content becomes available, until the UpsightBillboard is destroyed.
        Parameters:
        scope - The scope associated with the UpsightBillboard.
        Returns:
        Parameters for attaching marketing content to an UpsightBillboard. Return null to skip this piece of marketing content without displaying anything.
